item.title: Report X-2023081146
item.description:
Report X-2023081146

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-12
  • City: NORFOLK
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package came in with bottom closures open and an admin taped up the bottom and opened the top closures to replace the bottles inside. They were using the foam liner to lift the bottles while supporting the bottom when the foam liner failed and two of the 4L bottles fell out. They fell to the floor and shattered and released their contents. The spill and broken glass was cleaned up and placed in a HazMat tote. DescribePack: Package came with bottom closures open. Foam liner failed and glass bottles fell to the floor and shattered. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Spill was cleaned up immediately with loose absorb.
